Class GradeBusinessLogic

  • java.lang.Object
    • businesslayer.GradeBusinessLogic

  • public class GradeBusinessLogic
extends java.lang.Object
    This class provides business logic for managing grade data in the system. Assignment 2 Class: CST8288 - Lab Section: 013 Lab Professor: Siju Philip Date: Mar. 30, 2023
